name: Battle for Wesnoth
description: The Battle for Wesnoth is an open source, turn-based strategy game with a high fantasy theme. Explore the four corners of Irdya in seventeen solo campaigns and dozens of multiplayer maps, taking part in countless adventures as you go.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual-core 3.2 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
